body:
## Summary
- Upgraded install.sh script to v3.0.0 with major improvements
- Added comprehensive uninstall script with proper cleanup
- Enhanced CI/CD pipeline for installation testing

## Changes

### Installation Script v3.0.0
- **Enhanced environment detection**: Improved terminal color support, container/CI detection
- **Better architecture support**: Rosetta detection on macOS, musl libc support for Alpine Linux
- **Multi-shell configuration**: Automatic PATH setup for bash, zsh, and fish shells
- **Robust download handling**: TLS enforcement, retry logic, better error messages
- **Environment variables**: Added FVM_DIR and FVM_NO_PATH for customization
- **Temp file management**: Proper cleanup with trap handlers

### New Uninstall Script
- Comprehensive cleanup of FVM installation
- PATH cleanup instructions for multiple shells
- Graceful handling of partial installations
- Color output support for better UX

### CI/CD Improvements
- Added tests for Alpine Linux (musl libc)
- Expanded platform matrix (Ubuntu x64, macOS Intel, macOS ARM64)
- Environment variable testing (FVM_NO_PATH, FVM_DIR)
- Container detection and root permission validation
- Uninstall functionality testing

### Script Management
- Updated grinder task to sync both install.sh and uninstall.sh to docs/public
- Added validation script for testing installations
- Ensures scripts stay synchronized between directories

## Test Plan
- [x] Shellcheck validation passes for all scripts
- [x] Install/uninstall scripts match between scripts/ and docs/public/
- [x] Grinder move-scripts task works correctly
- [x] All shell scripts have executable permissions
- [x] Help command displays correctly
- [x] Version detection works (v3.0.0)
- [x] CI workflow tests pass on multiple platforms

## Breaking Changes
None - maintains backward compatibility while adding new features

## Related Issues
Improves installation experience and addresses common installation issues reported by users
